summary: REQ-1/REQ-2/REQ-3 appear to be implemented via new dashboard username gradient styling, more compact action tiles + smaller clock card, and a more colorful RegisterView theme. However, the diff summary also contains evidence of additional non-UI/auth/storage/admin-behavior changes (via frontend-file-summaries.txt) that were not requested and may violate the “UI/styling/layout only” constraint.

hallucinated_features.description: Authentication/admin flow restructuring (e.g., App.tsx removing registration toggle/rendering, session provider/userId assignment logic changes, and other auth/session type changes).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly constrains changes to UI/styling/layout and forbids changing backend data models or workflows for login/registration/approvals; these changes are not requested by REQ-1..REQ-3.

hallucinated_features.description: Changes to registration approvals behavior/storage format and uniqueness enforcement in the admin approvals section.
hallucinated_features.reason: Non-goal/constraint: do not add new features to admin panel or change admin behavior; also do not change workflows for approvals. These are not part of REQ-1..REQ-3.

hallucinated_features.description: Widespread admin panel restyling across multiple admin sections (Production/Work/Nasta/PaymentLoan/etc.).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested (scope is user dashboard header/layout and RegisterView styling only) and non-goal says do not add new features to admin panel or change admin behavior; this goes beyond the specified requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: User production history view redesign (card-based layout, no tables) and addition of a workerNameFormat utility.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-1..REQ-3 (scope limited to dashboard header prominence, tile/clock fit, and registration form color theme).
